result.eng: We'll do it step by step.
result.ga: Déanfaidh muid céim ar chéim é
result.orig: Déanfaidh muid céim ar chéim é
result.html: Déanfaidh muid céim ar chéim éWe'll do it step by step.
result.ponchtml: Déanfaiḋ muid céim ar ċéim éWe'll do it step by step.

result.eng: She walked a step or two.
result.html: Shiúil sí céim nó dhóShe walked a step or two.
result.ponchtml: Ṡiúil sí céim nó ḋóShe walked a step or two.
